Title: The Brave Little Toaster to the Rescue
Director: Robert C. Ramirez, Patrick A. Ventura
Writer: Thomas M. Disch (based on characters created by), Jerry Rees (additional characters), Joe Ranft (additional characters), Willard Carroll (story by), Willard Carroll (screenplay by)
Actors: Jessica Tuck, Chris Young, Roger Kabler, Deanna Oliver
Plot: The Brave Little Toaster and friends must rescue the animals at a veterinary hospital from being sent to a testing laboratory.
Language: Chinese, Mandarin, Japanese, Korean, French, English
